name: Bard
description: Masters of rhythm and resonance, Bards rotate powerful melodies that enhance allies, debilitate enemies, or shift the battlefield. With instant shouts and a blend of control and mobility, they thrive through versatility.

focus.description: A measure of the Bard's concentration and performance energy
focus.regeneration: 5 per second while not performing, none while performing

performance.description: Bards can perform songs that provide continuous effects while maintained
performance.limitations: Only one performance can be active at a time
performance.scaling: Effect potency scales with Charisma and Performance skill

shouts.description: Instant vocal abilities that provide immediate effects
shouts.scaling: Effect potency scales with Charisma and level

inspiration.description: Bards can inspire allies, granting them bonuses to their next action
inspiration.effect: Target ally gains +15% to their next ability or attack
inspiration.scaling: Bonus increases by 1% per point of Charisma above 15

skill_trees.name: Harmony
key_abilities: Healing Melody: A continuous performance that heals allies within 30 feet
Energizing Chorus: Increases resource regeneration for all allies
Protective Verse: Grants damage reduction to nearby allies

skill_trees.name: Discord
skill_trees.focus: Debuffs and control through dissonant sounds
key_abilities: Disorienting Noise: Confuses enemies, causing them to attack randomly
Painful Frequencies: Continuous damage to all enemies in range
Silencing Screech: Prevents enemies from casting spells

skill_trees.name: Virtuoso
skill_trees.focus: Personal combat enhancement through musical mastery
key_abilities: Battle Rhythm: Increases attack and movement speed
Deflecting Notes: Parries incoming attacks while performing
Encore: Allows immediate reuse of a previously used ability

elf.special_ability: Elven Harmony: Can maintain performances 25% longer

human.special_ability: Versatile Voice: Cooldowns on Shouts reduced by 10%

gnome.special_ability: Tricky Tunes: Discord abilities have a 15% chance to apply twice

playstyle: Bards excel at supporting allies while controlling enemies through their performances. They must balance their Focus resource between sustained performances and powerful shout abilities. Positioning is crucial, as most abilities affect targets in an area around the Bard. The class rewards creative thinking and tactical awareness, allowing players to adapt to changing battlefield conditions.
difficulty: Medium - Requires good resource management and positioning
recommended_for: Players who enjoy support roles with offensive capabilities and tactical flexibility
